org.gradle.language.c

Interface CSourceSet

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Buildable, BuildableModelElement, DependentSourceSet, HeaderExportingSourceSet, LanguageSourceSet, Named

    @Incubating
public interface CSourceSet
extends HeaderExportingSourceSet, LanguageSourceSet, DependentSourceSet
    A set of C source files.

    A C source set contains a set of source files, together with an optional set of exported header files.

     apply plugin: "c"

 sources {
     main {
         // Configure an existing CSourceSet
         c {
             source {
                 srcDirs "src/main/cpp", "src/shared/c++"
                 include "**/*.c"
             }
             exportedHeaders {
                 srcDirs "src/main/include"
             }
         }
     }
 }

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradle.language.HeaderExportingSourceSet

        exportedHeaders, getExportedHeaders, getImplicitHeaders

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradle.language.DependentSourceSet

        dependency, getLibs, lib
